name: brick production facility construction | brick production facility | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10910/documentation

The dataset represents the construction of the brick production facility in Quebec in the period 1954-2029. ;Specific data for the annual production and estimations for the land use were collected from the only producer of brick (made from shale) in Quebec, for the year 2012.;The average yearly production volume of brick shale is 66'957 t and the lifetime of the site is estimated to 75 years, ;Total land occupation: 344'3263 m²; about 12'000 m² building hall, 5'000 m² paved roads, 25'000 m² vegetation and the balance is considered as industrial area. ;Assumed weight of machines taken from clay pit construction ecoinvent (v3) dataset: 2'000t and service life estimated to 50 years.

This activity start from the construction of the facility.

The activity ends with the dismantling of the site and the end-of-life of the construction materials.
The dataset includes the land-use, building hall, the internal parkings and streets and the industrial machine (rock crusher). The disposal of the buildings and machinery is taken into account in the infrastructure datasets.

This dataset doesn't include the operation of the brick production facility.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Facility built in 1954 with a lifetime of 75 years. The complete lifetime is considered in the dataset
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Primary data from Quebec only producer of brick have been used for the land use. Estimation for the machinery is based on an existing european dataset. Uncertainty adjusted accordingly
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The data of the infrastructure corresponds to the current technology
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Land use data are based on the only Quebec brick producer. Other information is rough estimation. This dataset has been copied and modified from ''clay pit construction'' dataset covering the geography GLO (ecoinvent v3.0). The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Estimations from data provider and similar processes.

flow.name: brick production facility
flow.category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

exchanges.description: Calculated value. Amount calculated using industrial land occupation and  lifetime

EcoSpold01Location=RER
Calculated value. Extrapolated from industrial machine used in clay pit construction dataset. It is assumed that machinery lifetime is 50 years.
